outputs.output_descr:
As an inter-agency initiative, the objective the CADRI Programme is to enable the UN and other members of the ISDR system to support Governments build and implement a coherent framework for developing national capacities for disaster risk reduction, including preparedness for response.

Outcome 1] Provide technical support to UN Resident Coordinators/ Humanitarian Coordinators, UN Country Teams and various existing coordination mechanisms to reinforce their capacities in assisting the Governments and other national stakeholders to develop frameworks for capacity development in a coordinated and coherent manner 
[Outcome 2] Develop and disseminate training, learning and knowledge products, tools and methodologies in capacity development for disaster risk reduction at the global, regional and national levels
